title: How to use directed neuroplasticity to rewire any harmful COVID & pandemic PTSD effects
description:
Early bird tickets on sale now for my 2021 Mental Health Retreat: https://www.drleafconference.com

Get a free Cleaning up your Mental Mess workbook when you sign up for my weekly newsletter at drleaf.com


SHOW DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk about the COVID-19 virus and its potential impact on the brain, and how we can manage and improve cognitive side-effects of the virus.

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-to-use-directed-neuroplasticity-to-rewire-harmful-covid-pandemic-ptsd-effects


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

-Four Sigmatic: Get up to 40% off + Free Shipping on select bundles. To claim this deal you MUST go to Foursigmatic.com/DRLEAF.

-BiOptimizer’s Magnesium: For an exclusive offer for my listeners go to http://www.magbreakthrough.com/leaf and use DRLEAF10 during checkout to save 10% on your order.

-Daily Harvest: Stay cool, calm, and collected during the summer heat! Go to DAILY-HARVEST.com and enter code DRLEAF to get $25 off your first box!


PODCAST HIGHLIGHTS:

1:40, 15:20, 22:30 How the COVID virus can impact the brain

2:45, 6:50 The brain’s amazing capacity to change & heal

5:50 Anxiety is a signal, not a disease

7:50 How to manage & direct brain changes

12:15 Immunity, inflammation & the COVID virus

24:30, 30:00, 37:40 How brain building can help heal the mind & brain

25:40 Your brain is always changing, and you can learn how to direct these changes!

26:30 Ways to manage the emotional & physical effects of COVID-19


-Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

-Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app

-Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747


Follow me on social media for daily mental health tips & strategies:

-Facebook: Dr. Caroline Leaf: https://www.facebook.com/drleaf
